name: Lightning Rush
entries: Your body becomes enveloped in lightning. You become immune to lightning damage, you can squeeze through a space as small as 1 inch, and your movement speed is doubled. While this spell is active, you can take the Dash action as a bonus action, you donâ€™t provoke attacks of opportunity, and any creatures you move through must make a DEX Save. On a fail, they take {@dice 3d6} lightning damage and are knocked prone, or half as much on a success. When the spell ends, your hair becomes frizzy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level slot, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every slot above 4th.
